Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure that you can capitalize on this exceptional investment without delay. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing not only a valuable asset but also a competitive edge in your industry. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
